text: Wang Dingguo (; 4 February 1912 â€“ 9 June 2020) was a Chinese Red Army veteran and politician. She was the wife of Xie Juezai, president of the Supreme People's Court. She was a member of the Chinese People's Political Consultative Conference from 1978 to 1993. She was a member of the Communist Party of China. Wang was born in Yingshan County, Sichuan. Wang died on 9 June 2020 in Beijing from an illness, aged 108. ==References== ==Other websites== * Biography of Wang Dingguo Category:1912 births Category:2020 deaths Category:Chinese politicians Category:Chinese military people Category:Chinese centenarians Category:20th-century Chinese people Category:21st-century Chinese people Category:21st-century Chinese military people Category:20th- century Chinese military people
title: Wang Dingguo
